Bibliographic References: PP, no. 296; PPSupp, no. 409; Christie's, Sale Cat. 8 June 1937, no. 108, 3.
Imagery Description: (a) Dionysos, with 'skewer of fruit' in r. hand and thyrsus in 1., moving to r., young silen with kantharos in r. hand and thyrsus in 1., (b) two draped youths, one holding tambourine.
